word_group.brief_definition: 坦白地说；坦率地说；坦率地讲
坦率地说；坦诚发言；直抒己见

bilingual.target: 坦白地说，我真希望自己死掉。

bilingual.source: Put frankly, I don't agree with what he said.
bilingual.target: 坦白地说，我不同意他说的话。

bilingual.source: A: To speak frankly, it doesn't depend on me.
bilingual.target: A: 坦白地说，这不是我能决定的。

bilingual.source: Margot: Quite frankly, Fred, I don't blame him.
bilingual.target: 玛戈特：坦白地说，弗雷德，我不怪他。

bilingual.source: Frankly speaking, I don't know what she sees in him.
bilingual.target: 坦白地说，我不知道她看上他哪一点。

bilingual.source: Frankly, I'm disgusted to be a Chelsea fan right now.
bilingual.target: 坦白地说，我现在觉得身为一个切尔西球迷非常的惭愧。

bilingual.source: Frankly, I look upon it as a very promising experiment.
bilingual.target: 坦白地说, 我把它看作是一次很有希望的实验.

bilingual.source: And, frankly, they're misleading the president as well, apparently.
bilingual.target: 而且，坦白地说，他们显然也在误导总统。

bilingual.source: I mean, these guys were, frankly, dumb as a fence post.
bilingual.target: 坦白地说，这些大块头真是蠢到家了。

bilingual.source: Quite frankly, I really don't want to end up like that.
bilingual.target: 坦白地说，我不希望以那样的方式结束自己的职业生涯。

list.abstract: frankly，英文单词，主要用作形容词，用作形容词译为“坦白地，直率地（说），坦诚地，真诚地，平心而论”。

yingyinNormal.en: And, frankly, no one cared, except for Plankton.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且，老实说，没人在意这个，除了痞老板。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: And frankly, who can strike some people as being kind of a weirdo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且老实说，这个人在别人眼里还是个奇葩。

yingyinNormal.en: And, indeed, in our portrayal of it, we had to frankly water it down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 实际上，在我们对它的描写中，我们必须不加掩饰地把它稀释。

yingyinNormal.en: But you don't have many options right now, and quite frankly, neither do I.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过你现在没别的选择了，而且老实说，我也一样。

yingyinNormal.en: I was stressed, and I was frustrated. And quite frankly, I was, actually, I was embarrassed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 压力感与挫败感油然而生，说实话，当时感觉身陷窘境。

yingyinNormal.en: Frankly, it'd be more hygienic if they just had a plague-infested gibbon sneeze my hands dry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 老实说，用吹风机的话还不如让一只得了瘟疫的长臂猿打喷嚏打到我手干来得卫生呢。

yingyinNormal.en: And frankly, blood pudding is essentially the same thing. I don't know why he's serving both.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说实在的，黑香肠差不多也是一样的，我不知道他为啥整这俩菜。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. In fact, he was quite enthusiastic. He said, Frankly, if I could send you tonight, I would.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，他还相当热情呢，他说"坦白说"，"我巴不得今晚就送你去"。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me? She's my twin sister. She thinks she's funny, but frankly, I've never been able to see it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊？她是我的孪生妹妹，她以为自己很风趣，但说实话，我从来看不出。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I didn't realize. Well, frankly, I am relieved. You know, at your age, you should be playing the field.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没意识到，好，说真，我是放心的，你知道，你这年纪，应该多参与不同的社交活动。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, it's in our contract to serve on a university committee. And frankly, this is one I believe in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们与学校的合约中注明了得为大学委员会服务，老实说，我也认同这件事。

yingyinNormal.en: You're OK? No, no, of course I'm not OK. Malnourished, double kidney failure, and frankly, I've been off my tits for weeks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还好吗？不，我当然不好。我营养不良，双肾衰竭，而且说实话，我不正常好几周了。

yingyinNormal.en: It is common sense to take a method and try it. And if it fails, admit it frankly and try another. But above all, try something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想办法试一试很正常，如果失败了，坦白承认，然后重新来过，但重要的是要尝试。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright, listen, you guys have shown a lot of interest in me tonight, and I'm flattered, and quite frankly, a little frightened.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们今晚对我很有兴趣，我很受宠若惊，而且老实说，是有点受惊。

yingyinNormal.en: The issues the governor and the general raise are important ones. They transcend party affiliations and, quite frankly, politics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 州长和将军指出的问题都非常重要，这超越两党分歧，甚至超越政治。

yingyinNormal.en: If America Works succeeds, we will reinvent the American dream. If we fail in our attempt, we will admit it frankly and try another.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果美国就业法案成功了，我们将彻底改造美国梦，如果我们的尝试失败，我们会坦白承认，然后重新来过。

yingyinNormal.en: A lot of toes were stepped on in order to set this up for today. And frankly, I really don't know what you gentlemen plan to gain by it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了设置好今天的这套演示设备，可是折腾了不少人，坦白说，我真不明白你们两位想达到什么目的。

yingyinNormal.en: He does miss you when you are not here. And frankly, you're going to miss us. Because this is the last time we're all going to be together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不在的时候他非常想念你，老实说，你也会想我们的，因为这是我们最后一次在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to frankly, openly and honestly talk about how we've done a good job, or how we've done a bad job of bringing Chinese pop to the west.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要开诚布公地谈谈在将华语流行音乐带到西方这件事上，我们什么做好了，什么没做好。

yingyinNormal.en: What would you call a group of US based, enhanced individuals, who routinely ignores sovereign borders and inflict their will wherever they choose and who, frankly, seem unconcerned about what they leave behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会如何形容一群驻扎在美国的能力增强者？习惯性地无视主权国家边界，去哪、做什么，全凭自己意愿，而且老实说，对造成的后果也似乎毫不关心。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
